data.quote: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
data.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will.
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: To be happy, we must not be too concerned with others.
data.author: Albert Camus

data.quote: It's a helluva start, being able to recognize what makes you happy.
data.author: Lucille Ball

data.quote: The two enemies of human happiness are pain and boredom.
data.author: Arthur Schopenhauer
